nodes.id: 关于建国以来党的若干历史问题的决议

zh-cn: 关于建国以来党的若干历史问题的决议

description.zh-cn: 1981年6月27日由中国共产党第十一届中央委员会第六次全体会议通过的决议，对中华人民共和国建国以来的主要历史事件（特别是文化大革命）及重要历史人物（如毛泽东）作出了官方总结和评价。该决议是“拨乱反正”运动的一部分，标志着中国共产党在指导思想上的“拨乱反正”的完成。
description.en: A resolution passed by the 6th Plenary Session of the 11th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China on June 27, 1981. It provided the official summary and evaluation of major historical events (especially the Cultural Revolution) and important historical figures (such as Mao Zedong) since the founding of the People's Republic of China. The resolution was part of the 'Boluan Fanzheng' movement and marked the completion of this process in terms of the Party's guiding ideology.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，曾任中共中央副主席。主持了《关于建国以来党的若干历史问题的决议》的起草工作，并坚持在决议中确立毛泽东的历史地位和维护毛泽东思想。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as Vice Chairman of the CPC Central Committee. He presided over the drafting of the 'Resolution on Certain Questions in the History of Our Party Since the Founding of the People's Republic of China' and insisted on establishing Mao Zedong's historical status and upholding Mao Zedong Thought within it.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的主要缔造者。《历史决议》评价其“功绩是第一位的，错误是第二位的”，并指出他应为“文化大革命”这一全局性的、长时间的左倾严重错误负主要责任。
description.en: The main founder of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China. The 'Historical Resolution' evaluated him as having 'merits that are primary and mistakes that are secondary,' and pointed out that he bore the main responsibility for the 'Cultural Revolution,' a comprehensive, long-term, and serious leftist error.

description.zh-cn: 《历史决议》将其定性为“由领导者错误发动的，被反革命集团利用，给党、国家和各族人民带来严重灾难的内乱”，并对其在理论与实践上进行了全面否定。
description.en: Defined by the 'Historical Resolution' as 'a period of internal turmoil, erroneously initiated by the leadership and exploited by counter-revolutionary cliques, which brought severe disaster to the Party, the state, and the people of all ethnicities.' It was completely negated in both theory and practice.

description.zh-cn: 指纠正“文化大革命”错误的政治运动。《关于建国以来党的若干历史问题的决议》是该运动的一部分，其通过标志着中共在指导思想上完成了拨乱反正。
description.en: A political movement aimed at correcting the mistakes of the Cultural Revolution. The 'Resolution on Certain Questions in the History of Our Party Since the Founding of the People's Republic of China' was a part of this movement, and its adoption marked the completion of the 'Boluan Fanzheng' in terms of the CPC's guiding ideology.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十一届中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十一届中央委员会
en: 11th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央领导机构。其第六次全体会议于1981年6月27日一致通过了《关于建国以来党的若干历史问题的决议》。
description.en: The central leading body of the Communist Party of China. Its Sixth Plenary Session unanimously passed the 'Resolution on Certain Questions in the History of Our Party Since the Founding of the People's Republic of China' on June 27, 1981.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，时任中共中央书记处总书记。与邓小平共同主持了《关于建国以来党的若干历史问题的决议》的起草工作。
description.en: A Chinese politician, then General Secretary of the CPC Central Secretariat. He co-presided over the drafting of the 'Resolution on Certain Questions in the History of Our Party Since the Founding of the People's Republic of China' with Deng Xiaoping.

description.zh-cn: 时任中国社会科学院院长，负责《关于建国以来党的若干历史问题的决议》的起草小组。
description.en: Then President of the Chinese Academy of Social Sciences, he was in charge of the drafting group for the 'Resolution on Certain Questions in the History of Our Party Since the Founding of the People's Republic of China'.

description.zh-cn: 《历史决议》对其建国后的历史进行了总结，认为“文化大革命”使其遭到建国以来最严重的挫折和损失。
description.en: The 'Historical Resolution' summarized its history since its founding, concluding that the 'Cultural Revolution' caused it to suffer the most severe setbacks and losses since its establishment.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的指导思想之一。《历史决议》的核心问题之一是如何坚持和发展毛泽东思想，并总结了其活的灵魂，包括实事求是、群众路线、独立自主。
description.en: One of the guiding ideologies of the Communist Party of China. A core issue of the 'Historical Resolution' was how to adhere to and develop Mao Zedong Thought, and it summarized its living soul, including seeking truth from facts, the mass line, and independence.

description.zh-cn: 《历史决议》中认定的在“文化大革命”期间进行反革命活动的集团之一。
description.en: One of the groups identified in the 'Historical Resolution' as having engaged in counter-revolutionary activities during the 'Cultural Revolution'.

description.zh-cn: 《历史决议》中认定的在“文化大革命”期间进行反革命活动的集团之一。
description.en: One of the groups identified in the 'Historical Resolution' as having engaged in counter-revolutionary activities during the 'Cultural Revolution'.

description.zh-cn: 《历史决议》对其作出了否定性评价的政治运动。
description.en: A political movement that was negatively assessed by the 'Historical Resolution'.

description.zh-cn: 《历史决议》对其作出了否定性评价的经济和社会运动。
description.en: An economic and social campaign that was negatively assessed by the 'Historical Resolution'.

en: People's commune movement in rural areas

description.zh-cn: 《历史决议》对其作出了否定性评价的社会运动。
description.en: A social movement that was negatively assessed by the 'Historical Resolution'.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅。在1959年庐山会议上遭到毛泽东的批判。《历史决议》否定了当时对他做出的错误批判。
description.en: Marshal of the People's Republic of China. He was criticized by Mao Zedong at the 1959 Lushan Conference. The 'Historical Resolution' negated the erroneous criticism made against him at that time.

description.zh-cn: 《历史决议》对其作出了否定性评价的政治运动。
description.en: A political movement that was negatively assessed by the 'Historical Resolution'.

nodes.id: 彭德怀、黄克诚、张闻天、周小舟反党集团

zh-cn: 彭德怀、黄克诚、张闻天、周小舟反党集团

description.zh-cn: 中共八届八中全会关于“彭德怀、黄克诚、张闻天、周小舟反党集团”的决议中提出的概念。《历史决议》否定了这一决议。
description.en: A concept put forward in the resolution of the 8th Plenary Session of the 8th CPC Central Committee concerning the 'Peng Dehuai, Huang Kecheng, Zhang Wentian, and Zhou Xiaozhou Anti-Party Clique'. The 'Historical Resolution' negated this resolution.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一，被认定为“林彪反革命集团”的首领。
description.en: A former major leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, identified as the leader of the 'Lin Biao Counter-revolutionary Clique'.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东的妻子，“四人帮”的核心成员，该集团也被称为“江青集团”。
description.en: Wife of Mao Zedong and a core member of the 'Gang of Four', a group also referred to as the 'Jiang Qing Clique'.

description.zh-cn: 《历史决议》中提出的政治原则，被视为全党和全国人民团结的共同政治基础。
description.en: A set of political principles mentioned in the 'Historical Resolution', regarded as the common political foundation for the unity of the entire Party and the people of the whole country.

nodes.id: 关于若干历史问题的决议

zh-cn: 关于若干历史问题的决议

description.zh-cn: 即“第一个历史决议”，与1981年的《决议》是中国共产党自建党以来两个最为重要的内部历史文献。
description.en: Also known as the 'first historical resolution', it, along with the 1981 resolution, are the two most important internal historical documents of the Communist Party of China since its founding.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第十一届中央委员会
relationships.target: 关于建国以来党的若干历史问题的决议

description.zh-cn: 在其第六次全体会议上一致通过了《关于建国以来党的若干历史问题的决议》。
description.en: Unanimously passed the 'Resolution on Certain Questions in the History of Our Party Since the Founding of the People's Republic of China' at its Sixth Plenary Session.

relationships.target: 关于建国以来党的若干历史问题的决议

description.zh-cn: 邓小平主持了《决议》的起草工作，并多次就起草与修改提出意见。
description.en: Deng Xiaoping presided over the drafting of the 'Resolution' and gave opinions on its drafting and revision on multiple occasions.

relationships.target: 关于建国以来党的若干历史问题的决议

description.zh-cn: 胡耀邦与邓小平共同主持了《决议》的起草工作。
description.en: Hu Yaobang, along with Deng Xiaoping, co-presided over the drafting of the 'Resolution'.

relationships.target: 关于建国以来党的若干历史问题的决议

description.zh-cn: 胡乔木负责《决议》的起草小组。
description.en: Hu Qiaomu was in charge of the drafting group for the 'Resolution'.

description.zh-cn: 胡乔木负责的《决议》起草小组是在邓小平、胡耀邦的主持下进行工作的。
description.en: The drafting group for the 'Resolution', led by Hu Qiaomu, worked under the auspices of Deng Xiaoping and Hu Yaobang.

relationships.target: 关于建国以来党的若干历史问题的决议

description.zh-cn: 《决议》是“拨乱反正”运动的一部分，它的诞生是为了总结历史、统一认识，以明确中国未来的发展方向。
description.en: The 'Resolution' was part of the 'Boluan Fanzheng' movement, created to summarize history, unify understanding, and clarify China's future direction of development.

relationships.source: 关于建国以来党的若干历史问题的决议

description.zh-cn: 《决议》的正式通过，标志着中国共产党胜利地完成了指导思想上的“拨乱反正”。
description.en: The official adoption of the 'Resolution' marked the successful completion of the 'Boluan Fanzheng' in terms of the Communist Party of China's guiding ideology.

relationships.source: 关于建国以来党的若干历史问题的决议

description.zh-cn: 《决议》对“文化大革命”在理论与实践上作出了全面否定。
description.en: The 'Resolution' completely negated the 'Cultural Revolution' in both theory and practice.

relationships.source: 关于建国以来党的若干历史问题的决议

description.zh-cn: 《决议》对毛泽东的功过得失作出了官方评价，认为其功绩是第一位的，错误是第二位的，并指出他应为“文化大革命”负主要责任，这影响了对他的官方历史定位。
description.en: The 'Resolution' made an official evaluation of Mao Zedong's merits and demerits, concluding his merits were primary and his mistakes secondary, and pointed out his primary responsibility for the 'Cultural Revolution,' which influenced his official historical positioning.

description.zh-cn: 《决议》指出，“文化大革命”是由领导者（毛泽东）错误发动的。
description.en: The 'Resolution' points out that the 'Cultural Revolution' was erroneously initiated by the leader (Mao Zedong).

description.zh-cn: 《决议》指出，“文化大革命”被林彪集团等反革命集团所利用。
description.en: The 'Resolution' points out that the 'Cultural Revolution' was exploited by counter-revolutionary cliques such as the Lin Biao Clique.

description.zh-cn: 《决议》指出，“文化大革命”被江青集团（四人帮）等反革命集团所利用。
description.en: The 'Resolution' points out that the 'Cultural Revolution' was exploited by counter-revolutionary cliques such as the Jiang Qing Clique (Gang of Four).

description.zh-cn: 《决议》指出，“文化大革命”期间，党、国家和人民遭到建国以来最严重的挫折和损失。
description.en: The 'Resolution' states that during the 'Cultural Revolution,' the Party, the state, and the people suffered the most severe setbacks and losses since the founding of the PRC.

description.zh-cn: 在1959年庐山会议后期，毛泽东批判了彭德怀。
description.en: In the later stage of the 1959 Lushan Conference, Mao Zedong criticized Peng Dehuai.

relationships.source: 关于建国以来党的若干历史问题的决议
relationships.target: 彭德怀、黄克诚、张闻天、周小舟反党集团

description.zh-cn: 《决议》否定了中共八届八中全会关于“彭德怀、黄克诚、张闻天、周小舟反党集团”的决议。
description.en: The 'Resolution' negated the resolution of the 8th Plenary Session of the 8th CPC Central Committee concerning the 'Peng Dehuai, Huang Kecheng, Zhang Wentian, and Zhou Xiaozhou Anti-Party Clique'.

description.zh-cn: 在《决议》起草过程中，邓小平力排众议，坚决要求在决议中坚持和发展毛泽东思想，认为这是决议中最核心、最根本的问题。
description.en: During the drafting of the 'Resolution,' Deng Xiaoping went against opposing views and firmly demanded the adherence to and development of Mao Zedong Thought in the resolution, believing it to be the most core and fundamental issue.

description.zh-cn: 林彪被认定为林彪集团的首领。
description.en: Lin Biao was identified as the leader of the Lin Biao Clique.

description.zh-cn: 江青是“四人帮”的核心成员，该集团也被称为“江青集团”。
description.en: Jiang Qing was a core member of the 'Gang of Four', and the group was also known as the 'Jiang Qing Clique'.

relationships.source: 关于建国以来党的若干历史问题的决议

description.zh-cn: 《决议》提出并强调了“四项基本原则”，并将其定义为全党和全国人民团结的共同政治基础。
description.en: The 'Resolution' proposed and emphasized the 'Four Cardinal Principles,' defining them as the common political foundation for the unity of the entire Party and the people of the nation.
